name: "OM" Guitar
description:
This is my take on the tried and true OM or “orchestra model” first built by Martin in 1929. Built with a Lutz spruce soundboard, Norwegian Maple back and sides it has a crisp and focused sound with astonishingly quick response. It is evenly balanced up and down the neck with soul-centering bass tones and bell like trebles. It’s strong voice will project sufficiently to fill up an auditorium, yet is so responsive that it will sing at the lightest touch. For more images: http://jedidiah.ca Specs: Scale Length 650mm
Body Length 502mm
Lower bout: 385mm
Upper bout: 292mm
Body Depth at lower bout: 100mm
Overall length: 102cm

name: "OM" Cutaway Fanned Fret Guitar
description:
If you play in Drop D or other altered tunings then my multi-scale or “Fan-Fret” OM guitar is for you! The longer bass side takes ordinary guitar design and opens up infinite possibilities for rich, powerful bass. Shorter treble strings allow the production of high tones so sweet you can taste them. As with all my guitars this guitar is responsive and perfectly balanced from string to string. Although this guitar is designed to astonish the crowds with finger-style playing it is extremely versatile and lends its uncompromising palate to any style of music.
Built to order.

For more images, visit: http://jedidiah.ca

Specs:
Scale Length: 650mm 
Body Length: 502mm 
Body width: Lower bout: 385mm 
Body width: Upper bout: 292mm 
Body Depth at lower bout: 100mm 
Overall length: 103cm

name: Audaices Classical Guitar
description:
This guitar contains classical bracing but encompasses several generations of guitar modifications. Featuring 70's style pinstriping and gorgeous head scrollwork. It sings at the lightest touch and is made entirely from a repurposed antique mahogany table. One hundred years of existence permeates throughout this guitar. It was around when folk music was still considered modern!  It also proves that a beautiful looking and sounding guitar can be made sustainably. 

For more pictures, visit: http://jedidiah.ca

Specs:
Scale Length 650mm 
Body Length 485mm 
Body width: Lower bout: 380mm 
Body width: Upper bout: 296mm 
Body Depth at lower bout: 100mm 
Overall length: 101cm

name: Lattice Braced Classical Guitar
description:
This guitar has traditional classical exterior design. However the soundboard is built with the Australian lattice braced system for more volume and a powerful bright tone. Sustainably harvested Old-growth Cedar stump soundboard, Cherrywood back and sides. The neck is made of a vintage Honduras Mohogany table. The fingerboard and bindings are made from exotic Jatoba hardwood flooring. For more images: http://jedidiah.ca Scale Length 650mm
Body Length 485mm
Body width: Lower bout: 380mm
Body width: Upper bout: 296mm
Body Depth at lower bout: 100mm
Overall length: 100cm
